articles.author: Chris McGraw
articles.title: Black Friday TV deals are live with huge discounts (and giant screens) from Samsung, Sony, Hisense and more — save up to 60% - Yahoo! Tech
articles.description: Sale prices start as low as $60 (really!) for the newest TVs, ready to stream you a world of entertainment and live sports.
articles.content: If you're like me, your crummy old TV isn't cutting it anymore especially with Black Friday TV deals already flooding the internet. We're still a couple of days out from the main event (hopefully you… [+11138 chars]
